suite.doc: Part Two of the robotframework-requests library examples has been enhanced by using the SharedKeywordsAndListeners.robot resource file to add randomly generated data to a test through the "Create Various Random Test Data With The String Library" keyword. This keyword turns the robotframework-requests library examples into an API fuzz testing tool that can run in serial or in parallel.

suite.doc: Part Two of the robotframework-requests library examples has been enhanced by using the SharedKeywordsAndListeners.robot resource file to add randomly generated data to a test through the "Create Various Random Test Data With The String Library" keyword. This keyword turns the robotframework-requests library examples into an API fuzz testing tool that can run in serial or in parallel.
